content: Directly ahead of the Keeper's Shrine, you'll see the area is ablaze and a solitary Revenant stands by the edge. There's not much to do in this area but just before the Revenant, you can find a **Purple Lingzhi** to pull from the ground. There's also a green Wisp to absorb just to the left of the field.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass I'.
The content is as follows:
Directly ahead of the Keeper's Shrine, you'll see the area is ablaze and a solitary Revenant stands by the edge. There's not much to do in this area but just before the Revenant, you can find a **Purple Lingzhi** to pull from the ground. There's also a green Wisp to absorb just to the left of the field.
